abstract: M&T Bank’s talks to buy Sovereign Bank from Banco Santander have stalled over disagreements as to who would control the combined entity, with sources calling the negotiations “dead”, The Wall Street Journal reported.
snippet: M&T Bank’s talks to buy Sovereign Bank from Banco Santander have stalled over disagreements as to who would control the combined entity, with sources calling the negotiations “dead”, The Wall Street Journal reported.
lead_paragraph: M&T Bank‘s talks to buy Sovereign Bank from Banco Santander have stalled over disagreements as to who would control the combined entity, The Wall Street Journal reported.
